title: Life Chain And The True Horror Of The Eldritch Goblin (Part 3)
body:
Life Chain And The True Horror Of The Eldritch Goblin (Part 3)

Gobu stopped a few meters above the ground, some distance away from the armies of Demons and Monsters.

"This monster_" Scarlith, one of the S rank Blood Demons narrowed his eyes when he saw Gobu. Although Gobu was not an S rank monster, the dreadful feeling that he was giving was something that all of the Demons and Monsters had never felt before.

"This will be my first battle after coming under Master's command, so I can't let him down" Gobu muttered to himself in a low voice and a dark brown aura started to come out from his body.

"Madness Induction" The two mouths that were at the top of his head opened and his chilling voice rang out throughout the battlefield.

Just as his voice rang out, the dark brown aura that was coming out from his body covered the battlefield, engulfing thousands of monsters and Demons.
